Not Convinced?
Host NIT Inc has been operating for 4 years now - we've been around since 2012, and we are a fully funded company that owns and manage our own Network. Don't believe me? It's okay, a lot of people can make a claim. You can verify this any network look-up tool:
You'll need our ASN which is : 32306 .


You can also have a look @ what our customers have been saying about us by visiting our Testimonials page
http://www.cpanelhosting.com/testimonials.php  << Those reviews are all independent reviews that has been verified by a trusted third party company called searchen. They verify each review to make sure it not fraudulent or posted by anyone from our Company.


Top Notch Technical Support

  • 1.    - Guaranteed Response within 30 Minutes
  • 2.    - Most issues are completely resolved in 1-4 hours
  • 3.    -True 24/7/365 Dedicated Support
  • 4.    -Fully Staffed at all times with Technicians, Engineers, Electricians, and System Administrators



100% Network Up-time


Host NIT is connected to multiple backbone providers so that in the event of a failure with one, our network automatically switches to the next provider to make sure you stay connected! All servers and products are backed by our 100% Uptime SLA. We have Tier 1 Bandwidth Providers such as Level 3, Comcast, ATT and Verizon. Our facilities are fully HIPPA compliant and we have N +1 Backup Generators with over 6,000 pounds of Fuel. We also get first priority in receiving Fuel because we are located on top of the Jacksonville Federal Reserve thus resulting in maximum up time even in disastrous events.
